name: Air Offense Command
description:
Air Offense Command takes place in an alternate historical setting in the year 1941. You are taking part in a suprise attack on the Commonwealth of Anacrea. Why? Not your place to ask. Your tasks are:

  • STRATEGIC - inflict maximum damage on the enemy to break their fighting spirit.
  • OPERATIONAL - upgrade your ragtag air force with better plane, bombs, rockets, armor and engines.
  • TACTICAL - dodge enemy cannon, flak, guided missiles and fighters while delivering your own ordnance with pinpoint accuracy.
  • Currently included aircraft: Ju-87, B5N, two variants of Tu-2, P61, Do-335, Go-229, Yak-15, and last and very much least the I-153 if you are really desperate.
